PageTitle: peer filter-policy import (BGP-VPN instance IPv4 address family view) (group)
FuncDef:
The peer filter-policy import command configures an ACL-based policy for filtering BGP routes received from a specified peer group.
The undo peer filter-policy import command cancels this configuration. The peer filter-policy import command configures an ACL-based policy for filtering BGP routes received from a specified peer group. The undo peer filter-policy import command cancels this configuration. By default, no filtering policy is configured for the routes to be received from a peer group.
ParentView: BGP-VPN instance IPv4 address family view

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a peer group.
The name is a string of 1 to 47 case-sensitive characters, with spaces not supported. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

Specifies the number of a basic ACL.
The value is an integer ranging from 2000 to 2999.

Specifies the name of a named basic ACL.
The value is a string of 1 to 64 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces and must start with a letter.

ExtraInfo: If you do not want to accept all the routes from a peer group, run the peer filter-policy import command to configure an ACL-based filtering policy to filter the routes received from the peer group.
